div.div:
translog大道一定阈值，触发commit(flush) 默认每隔30分钟flush
1. 将buffer数据刷到os cache
2. os cache fsync强刷到segment file，写commit point
3. 清空translog，重启一个

switch.text: translog大道一定阈值，触发commit(flush) 默认每隔30分钟flush...

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
